featured.desc: The best of Dashword. Each article here is considered high quality.

2.2.desc: The latest Geometry Dash 2.2 and 2.21 news. Everything prior to update 2.3 will be covered here.

news.desc: The latest Geometry Dash news. From extreme demons to 2.2 reveals, this topic covers everything new happening in Geometry Dash.

video.desc: The latest Geometry Dash stories that come in video! Everything covered here has a video counterpart that you can watch for free.

opinion.desc: The latest Geometry Dash player takes on community events. Whether anything is good or bad for the game and community, we dig deep into Geometry Dash as a whole here.

list.desc: The latest Geometry Dash top extreme demons, top 2.2 news, or anything that can be ordered in an easy-to-read list format is here.

guide.desc: From how to get icons to downloading Geometry Dash 2.2 beta, all kinds of Geometry Dash guides will be covered here.

history.desc: From the mysterious level Element 111 Rg to the history of Nine Circles, here is everything to do with Geometry Dash history.

demonlist.desc: The latest Geometry Dash Demon List news. From top 1 extreme demons such as Acheron, Slaughterhouse, and Abyss of Darkness to upcoming levels like KOCMOC, all Demon List news is covered here.

editorial.desc: The latest news from the Dashword development and content team.

review.desc: The latest Geometry Dash level reviews and critiques. Not sure what to play? We have some great recommendations here!

2.3.desc: The latest Geometry Dash 2.3 news. From 2.3 leaks, previews, and guides, anything RobTop reveals will be covered here.

mods.desc: Discover the latest and greatest Geometry Dash mods for Geode, Mega Hack, and other mod loaders.
